revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:

|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 800 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6406E; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = B8:EB:97 |oui = B8:EB:97 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = CFE;6.30.163.2005;(r390094); |stockos = Linux |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;5003L1, 246GX, 1246 MY;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.10.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = ''randomly generated'' |defaultssid = TRENDnet811_2.4GHz_XXXX, TRENDnet811_5GHz_XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^TRENDnet811_2.4GHz_[0-9]{4}$,,, ^TRENDnet811_5GHz_[0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = |manuf = U-MEDIA |manuf_model = WRT-C40B |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/23/2013 |estreldate = 05/11/2013 |estprice = |upc = 710931130133 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00BKFYLFO |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4352; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43217T; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"WRT-C40B Rev:UC" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :A ''SK hynix'' H5PS1G63JFR-S6C (128MB) chip is shown in the photos. The FCC docs specify that this FCC ID is also used for the [[TRENDnet TEW-800MB|TEW-800MB]] :(''AC1200 Dual Band Wireless Media Bridge''). The TEW-800MB is also specified as an additional model in the FCC filing :for the [[TRENDnet TEW-812DRU|TEW-812DRU]] (''AC1750 Dual Band Wireless Media Bridge''). ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32169-trendnet-tew-811dru-ac1200-dual-band-wireless-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :"0500-253411000" is silkscreened on the board. :A label affixed to the switched Ethernet ports casing :indicates the ''[[U-MEDIA]]'' model of the device is WRT-C40B. :CPU, Flash, RAM, and Wi-Fi IC P/Ns are per ''SNB''. ===Third party firmware related=== *[http://www.trendnet.com/press/releases/view.asp?id=2745 ''TRENDnet'''s PR announcing '''DD-WRT''' availability] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== It's the same pinout as is used by the [[Linksys WAP610N]], :another ''[[U-MEDIA]]'' device. 
[3.3] (GND) (TxD) (RxD)
{{/Serial info}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
